name: latte
description: Open source density functional tight binding molecular dynamics.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: IBM's Engineering and Scientific Subroutine Library (ESSL).

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MVAPICH2-GDR is an optimized version of the MVAPICH2 MPI library for
GPU-enabled HPC and Deep Learning Applications. MVAPICH2-GDR is not
installable from source and is only available through a binary mirror.
If you do not find the binary you're looking for, send us an email at
mvapich@cse.ohio-state.edu. The binary mirror url is:
http://mvapich.cse.ohio-state.edu/download/mvapich/spack-
mirror/mvapich2-gdr/

dependencies.name: qmd-progress
dependencies.description:
PROGRESS: Parallel, Rapid O(N) and Graph-based Recursive Electronic
Structure Solver. This library is focused on the development of general
solvers that are commonly used in quantum chemistry packages.

dependent_to.name: lammps
dependent_to.description:
LAMMPS stands for Large-scale Atomic/Molecular Massively Parallel
Simulator. This package uses patch releases, not stable release. See
https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/5342 for a detailed discussion.
